column4: hey does anyone know how to get my belkin F5d7050 usb wi-fi to work on ubuntu 5.10
this guy perhaps: http://WWW.LinuxQuestions.org/hcl/showproduct.php?product=2820 but 'ndiswrapper' is ugly
and this open source driver allegedly now works, the very lastest version: http://rt2x00.serialmonkey.com/wiki/index.php/Downloads
